top_categories.workout_context: Sagan Fondo’s california sierra nevada/tahoe, mountain gravel demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Racing Sagan Fondo isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Sagan Fondo rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Sagan Fondo’s california sierra nevada/tahoe gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Sagan Fondo when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Sagan Fondo. Make this intensity feel like home.
Sagan Fondo’s california sierra nevada/tahoe gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
Sagan Fondo’s 7,000ft of climbing demands seated and standing versatility — the ability to change climbing style as gradient and fatigue dictate.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Sagan Fondo — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Every session at Sagan Fondo intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at Sagan Fondo — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on california sierra nevada/tahoe gravel.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Sagan Fondo — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.

race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at Sagan Fondo. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Sagan Fondo requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on california sierra nevada/tahoe gravel to build confidence. Expect: california sierra nevada/tahoe, mountain gravel, regional event.
